snippet: The proposal, which attracted broad support on the City Council, is aimed at better regulating use of the drug and reducing penalties that disproportionately punish black residents.
abstract: District of Columbia lawmakers vote to decriminalize small amounts of marijuana, in what advocates of more lenient laws hope is another step toward legalizing drug outright.
lead_paragraph: The proposal, which attracted broad support on the City Council, is aimed at better regulating use of the drug and reducing penalties that disproportionately punish black residents.

headline.main: Effort to Decriminalize Small Amounts of Marijuana Gains in District of Columbia
headline.print_headline: Effort to Decriminalize Small Amounts of Marijuana Gains in District of Columbia
